question_text: On which colour is the spinner more likely to land?
question_type: Multiple Choice Question with Single Answer
solution: Look at the spinner. The pink part is larger than the white part.
More of the spinner is pink than is white, so the spinner is more likely to land on pink.
backend_description: A circular pie chart divided into two sections. The larger section (approximately 75% of the circle) is colored pink, while the smaller section (approximately 25%) is white. There's a small arrow or pointer indicating the division between the two sections.
